articles.description: Olivia Colman (“Landscapers”), Jessie Buckley (“Men”) and Luke Evans (“Crossing Swords”) will voice parts in Netflix’s CG animated feature “Scrooge: A Christmas Carol.” The film is a supernatural, time-travelling, musical adaptation of the Charles Dickens’ be…
articles.content:
Olivia Colman (“Landscapers”), Jessie Buckley (“Men”) and Luke Evans (“Crossing Swords”) will voice parts in Netflix’s CG animated feature “Scrooge: A Christmas Carol.”

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: 'Absolute carnage' leaving Buble concert, Dorset fan says - BBC
articles.description: Sarah Clifford says it was chaos leaving the Hampshire venue and there were no parking marshals in the field.
articles.content:
A Michael Buble fan has said it was "absolute carnage" leaving the carpark after a concert during the heatwave. 
Sarah Clifford, from Poole, said there were no marshals in the field to escort the 15… [+2759 chars]
